Text.val: Author: Stephan Huppertz
04.11.2014 SH SCR19294 Part3: Added test to check if internal limit is exceeded via BCM039 (CLAB is stored with reason=90)
04.07.2014 SH SCR18959 Part2: CLNA_EXECUTIONDATE is now updated with BPH110.PO.DATEOUT
26.06.2014 GB SCR18991 Part3: extended range of selection
28.05.2014 SH SCR18933 Part2 Fixed update CLNA_EXECUTIONDATE (now + 1 day instead of 1 year)
15.05.2014 SH SCR18897 Added Part4 Remove deleted advances from MQ300; Extended Part2 to set CLNA_EXECUTIONDATE = date() + 1 day
if GSBU_TIME(2099) > 0 and time() > GSBU_TIME(2099) and skip BCM340 in this case (incl. further part2 submodules);
Part2:Removed call BAD001
25.04.2014 SH SCR18861 Part1 Added recalc of T300_404_ADVANCEMINTRANSFER/ADVANCEMAXTRANSFER
21.04.2014 SH SCR18837 Part 1: Changed program to delete always allTBWR rows
01.04.2014 JH SCR18811 Added Part3 AddRemainingAdvtoMQ300
-- Part 1 - Prepare new automatic advances
-- Part 2 â€“ Book advances
-- Perform final updates if at least one T300 is stored
... delete the selected TBWR row in G.S.
... calc v.RUNNUMBER
... delete the selected TBWR row in G.S.
... set execution date to next working day
-- Further handling if advance can be or cannot be handled automatic
@The selected CLNA row (ready only) has to be selected again because of possible updates in BCM340
-- Call BCM001 after final database updates in CLNA (see subtask),
program also selects the current CLNA row
@Select CLNA again for update, modified fields probably used in further steps of part 2, perhaps also other programs
@The above selected CLNA row in parent task (ready only) has to be selected again because of possible updates
in BCM340
-- Update CLNA_RUNNUMBER
-- Set variables to start final bookings via BCM001 and BAD001 after database storage of
current CLNA updates, see parent task
-- Limit exeeded

SQL_STMT_U.val: select MQDT_MQTY_ID, MQDT_DEPT_CODE, MQDT_USRID, MQDT_LINENO from :1/MQDT where MQDT_MQTY_ID between 300 and 302 and not(exists(select * from :1/CLNA where CLNA_ID = MQDT_INVO_NO and CLNA_CLIENTCHARGED = 'N')) for fetch only

Text.val: -- Taks use DSQL to avoid problems with lost records which are deleted in BMQ010
